resources.comments: Public IP Address resource for the Azure Bastion Host.
resources.name: [variables('public-ip-address-name')]

resources.comments: Network Security Group associated with the Azure Bastion Host subnet.
resources.name: [variables('bastion-nsg-name')]

resources.comments: Application Security Group associated with Riverbed VM NICs and used in the Network Security Group specified below.
resources.name: [parameters('rvbdGeneralApplicationSecurityGroupName')]

resources.comments: Network Security Group associated with all subnets in the Virtual Network listed below except for the Azure Bastion Host subnet which has a dedicated NSG.
resources.name: [parameters('NetworkSecurityGroupName')]

properties.description: Allow Application Gateawy subnet to App Application Security Group
Allow Riverbed appliances to receive Flow Logs from Azure Function source.

DO NOT DELETE - ALB will not function without this rule
DO NOT DELETE - Denies all traffic unless explicitly allowed

resources.comments: Virtual Network resource. Includes Bastion and Riverbed subnets as well as the private link and vnet integration subnets for use with the Azure Function. All subnets have appropriate NSGs associated with them.
resources.name: [parameters('virtualNetworkName')]

resources.comments: Subnet resources that are created above but, now need service endpoints for Microsoft.Storage access directly.
resources.name: [concat(parameters('virtualNetworkName'), '/', variables('bastion-subnet-name'))]

resources.comments: Subnet resources that are created above but, now need service endpoints for Microsoft.Storage access directly.
resources.name: [concat(parameters('virtualNetworkName'), '/', parameters('rvbdSubnetName'))]

resources.comments: Subnet resources that are created above configure service endpoints for Microsoft.Storage access directly.
resources.name: [concat(parameters('virtualNetworkName'), '/', parameters('siteName'), '-vnet-in')]

resources.comments: Subnet resources that are created above configure service endpoints for Microsoft.Storage access directly.
resources.name: [concat(parameters('virtualNetworkName'), '/', parameters('siteName'), '-vnet-out')]

resources.comments: Azure Bastion Host resource used to securely connect to the Virtual Machines rather than exposing RDP over the public internet.
resources.name: [parameters('bastionHostName')]

resources.comments: App Service Plan for the Azure Function.
resources.name: [parameters('appServicePlanName')]

resources.comments: Azure Private DNS Zone resource used with Private Link for the Azure Function
resources.name: [variables('privateDnsZones_privatelink_azurewebsites_net_name')]

resources.comments: Virtual Network Link for Private DNS Zone used for Private Link.
resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}', variables('privateDnsZones_privatelink_azurewebsites_net_name'), format('{0}-link', parameters('siteName')))]

resources.comments: Azure Function network interface for Private Endpoint.
resources.name: [variables('networkInterfaces_rvb_function_private_endpoint')]

resources.comments: Private Endpoint resource for use with the private link service associated to the Azure Function resource.
resources.name: [parameters('siteName')]

resources.comments: Private DNS Zone Group for use with Private Endpoint with the Private Link service associated to the Azure Function resource.
resources.name: [concat(parameters('siteName'), '/default')]

resources.comments: Azure Function web site configuration. The code still needs to be added to the site afterwards.
resources.name: [parameters('siteName')]

resources.comments: Cname or hostname binding for the site to make the URL more user friendly.
resources.name: [concat(parameters('siteName'), '/', parameters('siteName'), '.azurewebsites.net')]

resources.comments: Network Interface for the jumpbox.
resources.name: [variables('networkInterfaces_rvbd_bastion_eth0_name')]

resources.comments: Network interface for the Riverbed Net Profiler VM.
resources.name: [variables('networkInterfaces_rvb_netprofiler_eth0_name')]

resources.comments: Network interface for the Riverbed Flow Gateway VM.
resources.name: [variables('networkInterfaces_rvb_flowgateway_eth0_name')]

resources.comments: Jumpbox virtual machine resource.
resources.name: [parameters('jumpboxHostName')]

resources.comments: Flow Gateway Data Disk resources.
resources.name: [parameters('flowGatewayDataDiskResources')[copyIndex()].name]

resources.comments: Riverbed Flow Gateway virtual machine resource.
resources.name: [parameters('rvbdFlowGatewayHostName')]

resources.comments: Net Profiler Data Disk resources.
resources.name: [parameters('netProfilerDataDiskResources')[copyIndex()].name]

resources.comments: Riverbed Net Profiler virtual machine resource.
resources.name: [parameters('rvbdNetProfilerHostName')]

resources.comments: Storage Account used for Azure Function.
resources.name: [variables('functionStorageAccountName')]

resources.comments: Storage Account used for NSG Flow Log deployment. Only gets deployed if 'new' NSG Flow Log Storage Account is required based on parameter selection.
resources.name: deployFlowLogStorage

resources.comments: NSG Flow Log deployment. Only gets deployed if 'new' NSG Flow Log Storage Account is required based on parameter selection.
resources.name: deployFlowLogs
